# govFin

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of govFin is to offer tools to download, convert to a SQLite database and explore the [Willamette Government Finance Database](https://willamette.edu/mba/research-impact/public-datasets/index.html), a cleaned and aggregated version of the annual [Census Bureau Census of Governments](https://www.census.gov/programs-surveys/cog.html) data.

## Installation

The development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("luceydav/govFin")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
#library(govFin)
## basic example code
```
